outputs.output_descr:
# 1: The project seeks to enhance capacity of the Ministry of Justice to coordinate and monitor implementation of the Justice Sector Reform Process, at a time when it faces serious financial and human resources gaps;
# 2: In addition to helping the Government pursue critical reform priorities, the intervention is designed to catalyze the implementation of justice sector reform with a specific focus on improving the capacities of the National Legal Aid Council, University Legal Clinics and human rights NGOs to support mobilized youth empowerment initiatives for disadvantaged youth.

The Project's overall objective is to strengthen and support the comprehensive efforts to reform the justice sector in Moldova achieving the independence, accountability, impartiality, efficiency and transparency of justice system in line with the objectives of the Justice Sector Reform Strategy (2011  2016) and its Action Plan. The proposed overall objective will be achieved by implementing a number of project components, united by the common goal of advancing the justice sector reform.

project_descr: Support the Government of the Republic of Moldova in effective design and implementation of the reform of the Justice Sector
project_title: Support to Justice Sector Reform in Moldova
